is a famous red wine village in the Ahr valley, situated in Northern
. From August to November thousands of visitors from abroad enjoy the annual wine festivities, which culminate on the last weekend of september.

(Ahr valley railway) which stops in the village and in all neighboured towns. Direct connections to Bonn and Koblenz. In addition the bus #841 serves the whole valley from Remagen to Kreuzberg (Ahr).

value: offers a nice view over the Ahr valley and as far as Cologne and Bonn, if weather conditions allow
